value.title: Open your Power BI Desktop model in Excel with just one click (two methods)
value.excerpt: It is now possible to download your Power BI desktop data into Excel with a simple click and I am going to show you two methods in this video. Enjoy!  Erik Svensen tool: https://eriksvensen.wordpress.com/2020/07/27/powerbi-external-tool-to-connect-excel-to-the-current-pbix-file/  Changes in Power Shell

value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #07: Change multiple hardcoded path sources at once in Power BI
value.excerpt: If you have opened a power bi file on a different computer that has excel, csv, txt as source files, you probably have seen the error message telling you that Power bI could not find a part of the path.  I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: Real time dashboards in Power BI with Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Good evening, in today's video I will show you how to create a live stream, real time dashboard using an IoT device and Azure IOT hub, stream analytics and Power BI. Hope you enjoy it :)  Link to MS tutorial: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/stream-analytics/stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard

value.title: Round time to nearest 15 min with Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to round time to the nearest 15 minutes in Power Query, but of course, the same formula can be applied to other time intervals.  Rounding time can be needed if you want to group time in different buckets or bins for better visualization, but also if you have different

value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. For example, if you were displaying revenue by country and had no sales in Norway, then Norway would not appear anywhere in your visualization.  In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show

value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
